name: @sumanjitsg/redistil
description: A minimalist Redis implementation in Elm, bringing the power of functional programming to Redis interactions.
author: Sumanjit Sengupta

scripts.build: npx elm make src/Main.elm --optimize --output=dist/elm.js && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.dev: npx elm make src/Main.elm --output=dist/elm.js && npx tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.check-release-branch: if [ $(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) != 'main' ]; then echo 'Release script can only be run from the main branch.' && exit 1; fi
scripts.release: npm run check-release-branch && npm run prepublishOnly && standard-version && npm publish --access public
